title: Update static profile photo, Google Drive label, and footer closing message

requirements.summary: Replace the Hero avatar image by updating the generated static asset while keeping the existing avatar src path unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` exists in the build output and visually matches the uploaded photo.
The Hero section continues to load the avatar from `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` without any backend fetch.
No broken image icon is shown for the avatar on page load.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing generated avatar image with a 512x512 JPG derived from the uploaded `cropped_circle_image.png`, ensuring the output filename is exactly `frontend/public/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` and matches the provided photo.

Confirm the Hero avatar continues to reference the static path `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` (no backend fetch) and make no other behavioral/layout changes beyond ensuring the correct asset is used.

requirements.summary: Update the Google Drive contact card label to display "Google Drive (Projects)" while keeping the existing link behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Contact section, the Google Drive contact card displays the text "Google Drive (Projects)".
The Google Drive card still links to the existing `cvData.contact.googleDrive` URL and opens in a new tab.

file_operations.description: Change the Google Drive contact item's displayed text to "Google Drive (Projects)" (while keeping the href bound to `data.googleDrive` and preserving the new-tab behavior for http(s) links).

requirements.summary: Replace the footer copyright/caffeine.ai line with the provided closing message including a line break.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer contains the copyright/caffeine.ai line or link.
The footer displays the provided closing message, including a line break between the sentence and the "Regards Vibhanshu" line.

file_operations.description:
